>>37696554

“A little of both.” You chuckle at the camera angles between you two—feels like you're taking a selfie.

“Both?” She folds her arms. “What does that mean?”

“I wouldn't say I'm in it for the long haul, but I've got a feeling the lore is too important to just ignore.” You respond. “I'll be reading into it, but you aren't going to catch me speaking in 'thees' and 'thous' anytime soon.”

Ayla shakes her head. “Oh, come now. I'm not even that bad at my worst. So, I was wrong, then? Even you recognize that you've got to frame this game from a story perspective if you want any hope of making sense of the mechanics.”

“It seemed like a welcome change of pace, is all.” You shrug.

“Well, I /was/ going to extend you an invite to join the Writ Keepers.” She sighs.

You grin. "Me? A lowly Brawler? 'New-blood'?"

“Ugh, Dorian's never gonna let me live this one down...” A pause, and she turns away from the camera. "That's fine, then. You've got my contact, and you know I'll be around town if you want to..."

> One second. Let her know you're interested, but you need time to think.
> Let her know you're not interested.
> Ask about the Writ Keepers, and her opinion on the top guilds.
> Hang on. Ask why her name was on the Materialization Altar.

Bedtime is soon, posters. I'll be archiving and retiring within an update or two. Will probably run a shorter thread tomorrow.
